name: liquid-ooze

effect.x-y: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.

short_effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

flavor_text.x-y: Damages attackers using any draining move.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Damages attackers using any draining move.
